resources.string: Unable to confirm your phone number
Sorry, we are having trouble sending you a confirmation code.
This code has expired. Please resend confirmation code.
Please check your network and try again.

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s you are adding this email to your Digits account. All your apps authenticated with Digits will have access to this email address and their users will be able to discover you by email. Manage your account on %2$sDigits.com%3$s.
By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, %2$sDigits\ by Twitter%3$s will send a text message to confirm your phone number. Message & data rates may apply.
By tapping %1$sCall\ me%1$s above, %2$sDigits by Twitter%3$s will send a voice call to confirm your phone number. Call & data rates may apply.

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you agree to the %2$sTerms of Service%3$s, %2$sPrivacy Policy%3$s, and %2$sCookies Policy%3$s of Digits by Twitter, and that other users of this app can discover you by phone number and/or email.

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you agree to the updated %2$sTerms of Service%3$s, %2$sPrivacy Policy%3$s, and %2$sCookies Policy%3$s of Digits by Twitter, and that other users of %1$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.
Please check your code and try again.
Please check your email and try again.
Please check your number and try again.
Unable to send this number a text message.

We use Digits by Twitter to find more of your friends who use this app. When you tap OK, we\'ll upload your address book to Digits by Twitter so that we can help you find users of %1$s that you know or help other users of %1$s find you.
You have previously set a 2-step verification code on digits.com
